lambdamagic.io

クラス IOOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • lambdamagic.io.IOOperations

  • public final class IOOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains various methods for I/O operation.

    The methods in this class all throw a IOException.

    作成者:
    koiketakayuki

    • フィールドのサマリー

      修飾子とタイプ フィールドと説明

      static int CHAR_BUFFER_LENGTH 

    • メソッドのサマリー

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      static long copy(java.io.InputStream inputStream, java.io.OutputStream outputStream, long maximumLength)
      Copy bytes from the input stream to the output stream.
      static byte[] readAllBytes(java.io.InputStream inputStream) 
      static java.lang.String readAllText(java.io.Reader reader) 
      static void writeAllBytes(java.io.OutputStream outputStream, byte[] data) 
      static void writeAllText(java.io.Writer writer, java.lang.String text)

    • フィールドの詳細

      • BYTE_BUFFER_LENGTH

      • CHAR_BUFFER_LENGTH

    • メソッドの詳細

      • copy

        public static long copy(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                        java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                        long maximumLength)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copy bytes from the input stream to the output stream. Maximum byte length to be copied is specified as the third argument. Note that bytes count read from the input stream can be larger than the specified maximum byte length because reading process uses buffer. Buffer size is 8192.
        戻り値:
        totalCount byte count read from the input stream
        例外:
        java.io.IOException

      • readAllBytes

        public static byte[] readAllBytes(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        例外:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeAllBytes

        public static void writeAllBytes(java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                                 byte[] data)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        例外:
        java.io.IOException

      • readAllText

        public static java.lang.String readAllText(java.io.Reader reader)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        例外:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeAllText

        public static void writeAllText(java.io.Writer writer,
                                java.lang.String text)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        例外:
        java.io.IOException
